resources.string:
Your scores: %1$d 
Your time: %2$sh : %3$sm : %4$ss 

 result:%5$s Old record: %6$s

string-array.name: game_goal
string-array.item: Click all the good faces on the screen, bypassing the evil ones. Each level has an accuracy limit: Very easy - no limit., Easy - 90%, Medium - 80%, Hard - 40%, Very hard - 10%. If the percentage of your incorrect clicks is more than the limit, your result will not be counted. Sport mode adds time for you each time you answer correctly.
Repeat the musical sequence of notes exactly as shown.
Choose the correct number in the math example to get the correct solution

resources.string: select difficulty level to see your high score
